actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the U.S. Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel Bomar to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to engage in coastwise trade.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to document the vessel Bomar, owned by a certain individual as a vessel of the United States with the privilege of engaging in the coastwise trade and fishing so long as such vessel is owned by a United States' citizen.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the U.S. Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel Bomar to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to engage in coastwise trade.
